revised_title: Determining the Horary Alteration of the Position of the Terrestrial Equator
tldr: The author presents a mathematical method to determine the change in the direction of the Earth's rotation due to the attraction of the Sun and Moon. The study focuses on the horary alteration of the position of the terrestrial equator and provides a solution to the problem, which is essential for understanding the precession of the equinoxes and the Earth's rotation.
